register-details.name: WDOG_STCTRLL
register-details.description: Watchdog Status and Control Register Low

bitfield.description: Do not modify this field value.

bitfield.name: INTFLG
bitfield.description: Interrupt flag. It is set when an exception occurs. IRQRSTEN = 1 is a precondition to set this flag. INTFLG = 1 results in an interrupt being issued followed by a reset, WCT later. The interrupt can be cleared by writing 1 to this bit. It also gets cleared on a system reset.
